ygData.subject: My remaining big questions...
ygData.msgSnippet: 1. Whats the lodestone for at our new merchant? 2. Has anyone done any research into the unstable firewater mentioned in the journal? The one that sent a
ygData.messageBody:
1. Whats the lodestone for at our new merchant?

2. Has anyone done any research into the unstable firewater mentioned in the
journal? The one that sent a firework screaming into the storage facility?
I tried several combinations of multiple Gnomish Spirits and water, but no
progress.

3. Any idea where this "storage cavern" mentioned is?

4. I tried combining a stalking probes and a firewater from the other reference
in the first (2nd?) journal. Where Gimble was afraid the probe could
explode (funny, I'm HOPING the dam probes will explode! :) Anyone else
try stuff along this line?

5. Anyone do tinkering when EQ was beta? Any formulas for robots and such?
I know they were taken out, but maybe such recipes would give clues.

6. Anyone find any use for the small power sources and function force modules
found in Solusek?
